```{r}
source("../scripts/init.R", chdir=TRUE) 
work_diary_tasks = load_("work_diary_tasks", data_dict)
work_diary_hours = load_("work_diary_hours", data_dict)
```

```{r}
tasks_by_word = work_diary_tasks %>% 
  filter(value != "") %>% 
  mutate(value = str_to_lower(value)) %>% 
  separate_rows(value) 
```


```{r}
tasks_by_word %>% 
  group_by(time) %>% 
  count(value, sort=TRUE)
```
```{r}
tasks_by_word %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  count(value, sort=TRUE)
```
